message: What is the importance of creating a personal blog to show the details of your Skills and your projects implementation,design and technologies for recruiters and hr members  while applying for a job ?
story: Ahmed Gamal created a poll in Egyptian Geeks.

data.message: من مدتى القصيرة اوى ع الفريلانسر البلوج الشخصية بتفرج جدأ جدأ مع العميل ,, لإنها بتخليه يثق فيك اكتر لما بيشوفك بتشرح حاجة معينة للناس دى بتفرق مع العميل اوى وبتتحط فى البورتفوليو طبعأ ,, وكمان البلوجات الشخصية لو صاحبها بجد مستواها كويس فى التخصص بتاعوا بتفتح عليه ابواب اكتر للشغل لإن لو صاحب شركة او حد شغال فى شركة متابع المدونة بتاعته احتمال كبير يكلموا فى يوم ويعرض عليه اوفر كويس لإنه شايف انه حد بيفهم .

I don't know whether I understood the question correctly or not, but I'll answer the "what's the importance of creating a personal technical blog" question. Sorry if that's not what you are asking about.
For me, it's the motivation you get from the community. I love it when I publish a post and keep staring at google analytic's realtime metrics. I love it when people start liking or sharing the posts I write. But more importantly, you'll get feedback. Usually it's a valuable one. I wrote a post about what I think of Go, when I published the post I got a comment telling me about a feature that I was missing in Go. The last post I wrote, someone told me that there's a race condition in my code. He told me how to detect and fix it. So, it's a win win. You get motivated, learn new things and at the same time you share some of the knowledge you have.
